I'm currently a PhD student in Cognitive Science at Indiana University - Bloomington. My research interests center on learning transfer and generalization, which I investigate in a variety of domains (e.g. category learning, visuomotor skill learning, and decision making). To explore these topics, I use a combination of experimental and computational modeling approaches.
